benchmark_details.name: LAN2CB (Language to Collective Behavior)
benchmark_details.overview: LAN2CB is a framework that streamlines and generalizes the multi-robot coordination pipeline by transforming natural language mission descriptions into executable Python code. A dataset of natural language mission descriptions has been designed to support its development and benchmarking.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To develop a system that can automatically control robots to accomplish complex multi-robot missions specified in natural language without human intervention.

data.source: Curated set of natural language mission descriptions for various multi-robot tasks.

methodology.calculation: Success rate is calculated by the proportion of missions completed successfully.
methodology.interpretation: High success rates indicate effective translation of natural language missions into operational code.
methodology.validation: Evaluated through simulation and real-world deployment experiments.
